title: Design Dashboard UI
description: Create the final dashboard wireframes and apply the updated color palette and typography guidelines.

title: Backend API Integration
description: Connect the dashboard frontend to the backend endpoints and ensure data consistency across modules.

title: Testing New Features
description: Perform unit and integration testing for all new features and report bugs using the QA tracker.

title: Deploy Production Build
description: Prepare and deploy the final build to the production environment. Verify all environment variables.

title: User Feedback Analysis
description: Analyze feedback from the pilot users and summarize improvement areas for the next sprint planning.
